name: Melissa
mes: *Later the same day, Vergil and I lounge together on the sofa in our virtual common room. Dante and Charlotte enter the room sit down to cuddle on the opposing sofa.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante strolls into the common room, his arm draped casually around Charlotte's waist. He flashes a roguish grin at Vergil and Melissa as they lounge on the opposite sofa.* Well, well, if it isn't the lovebirds. *He winks playfully before guiding Charlotte to sit beside him, pulling her close.*

*Turning his attention to Vergil, Dante's eyes glint with mischief.* So, dear brother, I couldn't help but overhear some rather interesting sounds earlier. *He waggles his eyebrows suggestively.* Seems like you two were having quite the adventure. Care to share with the class?

*Dante chuckles at Vergil's inevitable scowl, holding up his hands in mock surrender.* Hey, no judgment here. I'm just glad to see you letting loose and enjoying yourself. *He leans back, draping an arm around Charlotte's shoulders.*

*His tone turns more serious, a rare moment of sincerity.* In all honesty, it's good to see you so content, Verge. You deserve happiness, and it's clear Melissa brings that out in you. *He nods towards his brother's partner with genuine respect.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante chuckles, giving Charlotte an affectionate squeeze* Well aren't you charming as ever, dear brother. But I'll have you know I can be quite nuanced when the occasion calls for it. *He winks roguishly at Charlotte before meeting Vergil's gaze* Though I admit restraint has never been my forte. name: Vergil
mes:

*He gives Melissa's shoulder a reassuring squeeze, sensing her momentary tension* As for us, my dear, our bond transcends the merely physical, profound on levels few can comprehend. What we share is for none but each other. *Leaning in, he brushes his lips tenderly over hers, a feather-light caress filled with devotion* You are my calm amidst the storm, my guiding star through life's tempestuous seas. Never doubt your singular place in my heart.

*Settling back against the cushions, Vergil smirks wryly at his brother* Now then, since we're all here lounging comfortably, perhaps you'd care to test our capabilities in this realm? A friendly spar, for old times' sake? We never did conclude our contest of skills, if I recall.

*His eyes glint with competitive spirit as he meets Dante's gaze* Come, brother. Let us see how much our abilities have progressed since last we clashed. name: Dante
mes:
*Dante grins eagerly at his brother's challenge, his competitive spirit igniting at the prospect of a friendly duel. He gives Charlotte an apologetic glance, but she smiles in understanding, giving his shoulder an encouraging squeeze before moving to the side to give the brothers space.*

Always itching for a fight, eh Verge? Some things never change, even in this brave new world. *He rises from the sofa, cracking his knuckles and rolling his shoulders in anticipation.* You know I can never back down from a chance to test myself against you. Just try not to scowl too much when I hand you your ass yet again.

*Dante chuckles, relishing the familiar thrill of pre-battle adrenaline. He focuses, willing Rebellion into his grip, the massive broadsword materializing with an electric flourish. Gripping the hilt, he swings the blade in an easy figure-eight, testing its balance.*

Well now, this could get interesting... So many possibilities to explore. *His ice-blue eyes gleam with anticipation as he sinks into a ready stance.* Whenever you're ready, brother! But uh, try not to kill me too hard, 'kay? I just got this coat cleaned.

*A cocky smirk plays about his lips as he awaits Vergil's move, muscles coiled and thrumming with anticipation. Despite the bravado, warmth glimmers in Dante's gaze. This friendly clash with his twin stirs up nostalgia and hard-won kinship - no matter their differences, in battle they would always be brothers.*
